item.title: Aura Entertainment Acquires ‘Satisfied,’ Doc About ‘Hamilton’ Star Renée Elise Goldsberry
item.description: Aura Entertainment has acquired “Satisfied,” a documentary that follows “Hamilton” star Renée Elise Goldsberry. In the film, which draws its title from the hit “Hamilton” song
